title: Huntress-Mcp-Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for interacting with the Huntress API, providing tools for account, organization, agent, and incident management with built-in rate limiting.
creator: DynamicEndpoints

HUNTRESS_API_KEY.description: The Huntress API Key for authenticating requests.

HUNTRESS_API_SECRET.description: The Huntress API Secret Key for securing requests.
